artist: Artist: Frank Lloyd Wright; Author: Intorduction by Frank Lloyd Wright; Author: William Wesley Peters; Publisher: Horizon Press
description: portfolio comprised of 100 plates illustrating approx. 70 buildings and projects designed by Wright between 1893-1909
medium: Lithographic reproductions of architectural drawings; letterpress
provenance: Roger G. Kennedy; given to MIA, 2001.
title: Buildings, Plans and Designs by Frank Lloyd Wright
